subtitle: VTOL & Regular Aircraft
description: Participated in SAEINDIA DDC 2025 with a focus on designing and building VTOL and regular aircraft models.
details: The project involved advanced aerodynamics and structural design for competition readiness.

title: LLM
subtitle: Book Recommendation System
description: Built a book recommendation system using modern AI/ML techniques.
details: Vector search and zero-shot classification to categorize books into themes.
LangChain frameworks for working with Facebook BART LLM.
Sentiment and emotion analysis from book descriptions using PyCharm and Jupyter Notebook.

title: Microwave Imaging Technology
subtitle: Land Coverage Prediction
description: Used Sentinel-1 SAR data and SNAP platform for land analysis.
details: Predict land coverage area using K-means clustering and backscatter signals.
Applied Random Forest supervised classification for accuracy measurement.
